bind.relevant: selected( /child_referral_follow_up/g_person_condition/current_condition , 'no_change') or selected( /child_referral_follow_up/g_person_condition/current_condition , 'getting_sicker') or selected( /child_referral_follow_up/g_person_condition/current_condition , 'dead') or selected( /child_referral_follow_up/g_missed_referral/missed_health_facility , 'died')
